S.FORM: Musa ta tnburah dxral ka saya.
Mosa ta tnborah dxral ka saya.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Niqan tiyadan sskaya ka hiya.
Niqan tiyadan sskaya ka hiya.
Saya ka hana ku mita mnudus bay diyadan.
Saya ka hana ko mita mnodos bay diyadan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Niqan tlaway ka sskaya hiya.
Niqan tlaway ka sskaya hiya.
Ibah! Ibah! Snkuxul ku tlaway, malu bay qtan.
Ibah! Ibah! Snkoxol ko tlaway, malo bay qtan.
S.TRANSL: Ibah! Ibah! 我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Niqan tlaway sskaya ka hiya.
Niqan tlaway sskaya ka hiya.
Uxay tlaway ka way, walu ka way.
Uxay tlaway ka way, walo ka way.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Eniq hini iya usa thiyaq balay nniqan wah!
Eniq hini iya osa thiyaq balay nniqan wah!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Iyaq, uxay nami musa thiyaq balay nniqan.
Iyaq, oxay nami mosa thiyaq balay nniqan.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Iya uda tmalang, thuway mksa kiya ka ini uda skribuc.
Iya oda tmalang, thoway mksa kiya ka ini oda skriboc.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Iyux ku nhari qmita.
Iyox ko nhari qmita.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Hmuya su mchaya musa beywi hiya ka isu?
Hmoya so mchaya mosa beywi hiya ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Mriq ku rulu musa.
Mriq ko rolo mosa.
Mnchuya musa byoing ka hiya?
Mnchoya mosa byoing ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Mnksa musa byoing ka hiya.
Mnksa mosa byoing ka hiya.
Mnchuya su musa Pnghu ka isu?
Mnchoya so mosa Pngho ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Pnapa ku skoki ka musa Pnghu.
Pnapa ko skoki ka mosa Pngho.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Mnchuya su musa Pnghu ka isu?
Mnchoya so mosa Pngho ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Pnapa ku asu ka musa Pnghu.
Pnapa ko aso ka mosa Pngho.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Tnapa su manu ka musa sapah?
Tnapa so mano ka mosa sapah?
Tnapa ku cyeyyun ka musa sapah.
Tnapa ko cyeyyon ka mosa sapah.
Tnapa manu musa sapah pyasan ka Tapas?
Tnapa mano mosa sapah pyasan ka Tapas?
S.TRANSL: How does Tapas go to school?

S.FORM: Tapa kisya musa sapah pyasan ka Tapas.
Tapa kisya mosa sapah pyasan ka Tapas.
S.TRANSL: Tapas goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Tapa manu musa pnrhulan ka Sudu?
Tapa mano mosa pnrholan ka Sodo?
S.TRANSL: How does Basaw go to church?

S.FORM: Mriq ddeyngsya musa pnrhulan ka Sudu.
Mriq ddeyngsya mosa pnrholan ka Sodo.
S.TRANSL: Sudu goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Tapa su cyeyyun musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
Tapa so cyeyyon mosa sapah pyasan ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Uxay, tapa ku basu musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
Uxay, tapa ko baso mosa sapah pyasan ka yako.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Mriq su ddeyngsya musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
Mriq so ddeyngsya mosa sapah pyasan ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Iyaq, mriq ku ddeyngsya musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
Iyaq, mriq ko ddeyngsya mosa sapah pyasan ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Tapa su kawtyey musa Takaw ka isu?
Tapa so kawtyey mosa Takaw ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Iyaq, tapa ku kawtyey musa Takaw ka yaku.
Iyaq, tapa ko kawtyey mosa Takaw ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Musa Tayto pa tapa su kisya ya skoki?
Mosa Tayto pa tapa so kisya ya skoki?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Tapa ku skoki, tapa skoki mi kisya u nuqu ini biyaw ka tapa skoki.
Tapa ko skoki, tapa skoki mi kisya o noqo ini biyaw ka tapa skoki.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Musa su pnrhulan pa tapa su basu ya mriq rulu?
Mosa so pnrholan pa tapa so baso ya mriq rolo?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Mriq ku rulu ka musa pnrhulan, mriq rulu mi tapa basu pa nuqu mslxan ka mriq rulu.
Mriq ko rolo ka mosa pnrholan, mriq rolo mi tapa baso pa noqo mslxan ka mriq rolo.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Bbriyan cawsu u msdalih sapah namu?
Bbriyan cawso o msdalih sapah namo?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: Ini sdalih, mriq ku otobay musa briyan Cawsu.
Ini sdalih, mriq ko otobay mosa briyan Cawso.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Msdalih sapah pyasan ka sapah yobing?
Msdalih sapah pyasan ka sapah yobing?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Msdalih balay, mksa da u kiya ka mpdhuq da.
Msdalih balay, mksa da o kiya ka mpdhoq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Msdalih ppanan rulu ka sanan mkan idaw?
Msdalih ppanan rolo ka sanan mkan idaw?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Mlatac ppanan rulu da u mksa 5 pungkang daw kiya ka dhuq da.
Mlatac ppanan rolo da o mksa 5 pongkang daw kiya ka dhoq da.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Niqan diyax su saya?
Niqan diyax so saya?
Hmuya pa?
Hmoya pa?
Smatang ku musa mying sunan.
Smatang ko mosa mying sonan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Niqan ddaun mu uka ku sapah saya. Babaw da haw!
Niqan ddaon mo oka ko sapah saya. Babaw da haw!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧！
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: So kiya u niqan ka diyax su kusun pa? Yahun misu mying kusun da.
So kiya o niqan ka diyax so koson pa? Yahon miso mying koson da.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Malu, twaun misu sapah.
Malo, twaon miso sapah.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Malu ku phnang hnang su? Yuxun mu mbahang mi matas.
Malo ko phnang hnang so? Yoxon mo mbahang mi matas.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Malu wah! Ini huya.
Malo wah! Ini hoya.
Malu psueyga?
Malo psoeyga?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Ini ku so mndungus qtan, ini ndwani smtur ka soko uri, iya ta haw!
Ini ko so mndongos qtan, ini ndwani smtor ka soko ori, iya ta haw!
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，我們不要啦!
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: So kiya daw psasing ku da malu da.
So kiya daw psasing ko da malo da.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Iya psasing uri.
Iya psasing ori.
Mhuway su balay! Srwanun su ka knan muda smiling sunan.
Mhoway so balay! Srwanon so ka knan moda smiling sonan.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝您! 願意讓我訪問您。
Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Ini huya, iyux su mpsiling manu?
Ini hoya, iyox so mpsiling mano?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Risaw su cida han pa manu ka qpahun su?
Risaw so cida han pa mano ka qpahon so?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Keysacu ku cuxan han, binaw wada ku msangay qpahun niyi ka saya da.
Keysaco ko coxan han, binaw wada ko msangay qpahon niyi ka saya da.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: So kiya u wa su qmpah ka saya na?
So kiya o wa so qmpah ka saya na?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Wa ku qmpah sapah pyasan ka saya.
Wa ko qmpah sapah pyasan ka saya.
Wa mniq alang ka llaqi su uri?
Wa mniq alang ka llaqi so ori?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ini, wa mniq alang mkbrnux kana ka llaqi mu.
Ini, wa mniq alang mkbrnox kana ka llaqi mo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: So kiya daw murux su nanaq mniq sapah?
So kiya daw morox so nanaq mniq sapah?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Tmabu ku kingal huling mi kingal qduda uri na, tnsapah mu ka dhiya uri.
Tmabo ko kingal holing mi kingal qdoda ori na, tnsapah mo ka dhiya ori.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Tmabu ku kingal ngiyaw nina, niqan tnbuwan ka thiqan pa ini ksdamac.
Tmabo ko kingal ngiyaw nina, niqan tnbowan ka thiqan pa ini ksdamac.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Iyux ku mpsiling sunan quri pnwaya umaduk.
Iyox ko mpsiling sonan qori pnwaya omadok.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Ini knou ka knkla mu, banaw klaun mu duma u cyukun misu kana.
Ini knoo ka knkla mo, banaw klaon mo doma o cyokon miso kana.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Qqiya ddiyun namu umaduk pa niqan manu ka pnwaya namu?
Qqiya ddiyon namo omadok pa niqan mano ka pnwaya namo?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Qqiya ddiyun nami umaduk pa naqah tlngun qridin.
Qqiya ddiyon nami omadok pa naqah tlngon qridin.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女性碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: So kiya u malu msupu musa umaduk ka qridin?
So kiya o malo msopo mosa omadok ka qridin?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Naqah! Naqah musa umaduk ka qridin.
Naqah! Naqah mosa omadok ka qridin.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Awi, ddiyuc pciyus damac ka sinaw micyo, uka sinaw micyo ka sapah da, usa mari sinew micyo.
Awi, ddiyoc pciyos damac ka sinaw micyo, oka sinaw micyo ka sapah da, osa mari sinew micyo.
S.TRANSL: Awi，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Qabus, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Niqan 1 rusuq ka pchdanan nina, ana ini bari pa!
Niqan 1 rosoq ka pchdanan nina, ana ini bari pa!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Ini tuku ka 1 rusuq, usa mari 2 rusuq dungan.
Ini toko ka 1 rosoq, osa mari 2 rosoq dongan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Mari ku sinaw micyo, niqan namu pbari?
Mari ko sinaw micyo, niqan namo pbari?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Niqan hmi! Khnu ka briyun su?
Niqan hmi! Khno ka briyon so?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Mari ku 2 rusuq, mari ku 1 lubuy buwax uri.
Mari ko 2 rosoq, mari ko 1 loboy bowax ori.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Ni ka buwax, manu niya na ka briyun su dungan?
Ni ka bowax, mano niya na ka briyon so dongan?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Mari ku balung dungan, niqan namu pbari uri?
Mari ko balong dongan, niqan namo pbari ori?
S.TRANSL: 我還要買蛋，你們也有賣嗎?
I want to buy eggs, do you sell them too?

S.FORM: Wada qduwan mari ka balung nami da.
Wada qdowan mari ka balong nami da.
Mari ku lukus.
Mari ko lokos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: So mnmnu ka sntangan su?
So mnmno ka sntangan so?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Mari ku butun ucux na lukus.
Mari ko boton ocox na lokos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka mbanah lukus niyi?
Hmoya ka mbanah lokos niyi?
Niqan ini pntna kluwanan rakaw niya?
Niqan ini pntna klowanan rakaw niya?
Niqan nami rakaw mbhuway mi rakaw mcays mi rakaw tmkarac na.
Niqan nami rakaw mbhoway mi rakaw mcays mi rakaw tmkarac na.
S.TRANSL: 我們還有白色、黃色和藍色。
We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Bqani ku 1 lukus rakaw tmkarac.
Bqani ko 1 lokos rakaw tmkarac.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Teymu, mnusa su inu ka soni? Mnusa su pskbiyax hiyi?
Teymo, mnosa so ino ka soni? Mnosa so pskbiyax hiyi?
S.TRANSL: Teymu，你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Teymu, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Uxay, mnusa ku dmayaw bubu rudan mu pbari sama.
Uxay, mnosa ko dmayaw bobo rodan mo pbari sama.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: So kiya hay! Niqan diyax su kman saya? Supu ta mkan idaw haw?
So kiya hay! Niqan diyax so kman saya? Sopo ta mkan idaw haw?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊！你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯？
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Naqah! Musa ku mari lukus.
Naqah! Mosa ko mari lokos.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Snolun misu musa.
Snolon miso mosa.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay, khnu pila ka sama niyi?
Sndamac so balay, khno pila ka sama niyi?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: 20 krtan pila ka 1 sama.
20 krtan pila ka 1 sama.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka bunga niyi?
Piya pila ka bonga niyi?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: 30 krtan pila ka 1 king bunga.
30 krtan pila ka 1 king bonga.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Biqi ku 2 bnkiyan sama mi 1 tuting bunga.
Biqi ko 2 bnkiyan sama mi 1 toting bonga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Sudu, cnhungi ku madas ingpicu da, malu su skbarux knan?
Sodo, cnhongi ko madas ingpico da, malo so skbarox knan?
S.TRANSL: Sudu，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Sudu, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Uka ka naku uri, na Ayuc ka ingpicu niyi.
Uka ka nako ori, na Ayoc ka ingpico niyi.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Ayuc’s.

S.FORM: Kbrxi mu tnayis han haw? Uxay mu biyaw subway sunan dungan.
Kbrxi mo tnayis han haw? Uxay mo biyaw sobway sonan dongan.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dsi.
Iyaq, dsi.
Mhuway su balay, dyawi ku rmngaw ka Ayuc uri.
Mhoway so balay, dyawi ko rmngaw ka Ayoc ori.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Ayuc for me.

S.FORM: Manu ka sntangan su?
Mano ka sntangan so?
Miyah ku tbrinah muway 2 patas ni.
Miyah ko tbrinah moway 2 patas ni.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Iyaq, manu dungan ka sntangan su na?
Iyaq, mano dongan ka sntangan so na?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Mpkbarux ku 3 patas niyi.
Mpkbarox ko 3 patas niyi.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Mhdu da. Iya chngi mk3 diyax daw yahi tbrinah muway dungan.
Mhdo da. Iya chngi mk3 diyax daw yahi tbrinah moway dongan.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ini su sbway knan ka ssurus nina.
Ini so sbway knan ka ssoros nina.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Tna misu tbrnahun muway ciwa da.
Tna miso tbrnahon moway ciwa da.
Ma wada uka ka ssurus mu da.
Ma wada oka ka ssoros mo da.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Ya su wada kbrxan Trmi da.
Ya so wada kbrxan Trmi da.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Trmi?

S.FORM: Ini ku kla. Hayi mu smiling ka hiya.
Ini ko kla. Hayi mo smiling ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Kbrxi misu ka ssurus mu han.
Kbrxi miso ka ssoros mo han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Sawa, knbrxan su na Ukan ka pnlkusan su lukus jyanba niyi?
Sawa, knbrxan so na Ukan ka pnlkosan so lokos jyanba niyi?
S.TRANSL: Sawa, did Ukan lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Uxay, bnari ku na bubu mu ka niyi.
Uxay, bnari ko na bobo mo ka niyi.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Mntna nisu ka lukus jynba na Ukan.
Mntna niso ka lokos jynba na Ukan.
S.TRANSL: Ukan’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Mqalux ka lukus jynba niya, ini pntna rakaw nami.
Mqalox ka lokos jynba niya, ini pntna rakaw nami.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Kumu, knbarux su hbangan Pawan?
Komo, knbarox so hbangan Pawan?
S.TRANSL: Kumu, did you borrow money from Pawan?

S.FORM: Niqan, ida mu tbrnahun muway saya, wada ku cnhungi madas pila da.
Niqan, ida mo tbrnahon moway saya, wada ko cnhongi madas pila da.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: Tbrnahun su muway knuwan?
Tbrnahon so moway knowan?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Tbrnahun mu muway kusun ka hiya.
Tbrnahon mo moway koson ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dyaun misu rmngaw ka Pawan.
Iyaq, dyaon miso rmngaw ka Pawan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Pawan for you.

S.FORM: Kasi ka dmuwi dangal btunux qmraq ka qolic, tkurih u dmuwi serak qmraq ka malu, so ka beyhing ccamac pa, kasi ka dmuwi durang ka malu, so kiya ka mndungus.
Kasi ka dmowi dangal btonox qmraq ka qolic, tkorih o dmowi serak qmraq ka malo, so ka beyhing ccamac pa, kasi ka dmowi dorang ka malo, so kiya ka mndongos.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Kla bay so kiya, wada ku qnuqu da! Kiya ka ini mu bay dhqi qmraq.
Kla bay so kiya, wada ko qnoqo da! Kiya ka ini mo bay dhqi qmraq.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Tsani misu ssalu dangal mi serak mi durang nduray da.
Tsani miso ssalo dangal mi serak mi dorang ndoray da.
S.TRANSL: 我下次再教你怎麼製作這幾種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Malu wah! Laway bay knmalu kiya da! So kiya daw mpanganl ku ccamac nxan da.
Malo wah! Laway bay knmalo kiya da! So kiya daw mpanganl ko ccamac nxan da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Knbrawan bay ka spriq qnpahan da, sani mangal ka soki skuwan qqiya, nta qnpahan.
Knbrawan bay ka spriq qnpahan da, sani mangal ka soki skowan qqiya, nta qnpahan.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Wa psanun inu ka soki?
Wa psanon ino ka soki?
Wa mniq siyaw brunguy, musa su kcka skuwan qqiya daw kiya ka qtaun su da.
Wa mniq siyaw brongoy, mosa so kcka skowan qqiya daw kiya ka qtaon so da.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Qdahang mangal, iya qluqah, mhungun balay ka soki.
Qdahang mangal, iya qloqah, mhongon balay ka soki.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷，鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Iya tuqu qmqah durang mu!
Iya toqo qmqah dorang mo!
Winu ka durang su?
Wino ka dorang so?
Wa mniq trahuc qhuni way ka durang mu.
Wa mniq trahoc qhoni way ka dorang mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Ma su klaun bay?
Ma so klaon bay?
Niyi hini ka pnskrayan mu, klaun mu winu ka durang mu.
Niyi hini ka pnskrayan mo, klaon mo wino ka dorang mo.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Niyi ka kobu qcurux, psaun nami siyaw yayung tnqcurux.
Niyi ka kobo qcorox, psaon nami siyaw yayong tnqcorox.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Uka nami kobu ka yami hiya, pngahi nami mangal qcurux ka yami.
Uka nami kobo ka yami hiya, pngahi nami mangal qcorox ka yami.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Uxay ku dnuwi ngahi ka yaku, tsani ku nduray da haw?
Uxay ko dnowi ngahi ka yako, tsani ko ndoray da haw?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Malu wah! Psupu ta musa pngahi nduray da.
Malo wah! Psopo ta mosa pngahi ndoray da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Tsanun misu smmalu kobu nduray da.
Tsanon miso smmalo kobo ndoray da.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Wa lmlu ka bhniq ngahi su da, ya wisu tdiyal qcurux da! Bbili nhari.
Wa lmlo ka bhniq ngahi so da, ya wiso tdiyal qcorox da! Bbili nhari.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Kiya hari da, scuqi lmlu ka asu da. Mniq ku hini bnbil bhniq ngahi, usa hnali way dyawi ku mangal ka ami.
Kiya hari da, scoqi lmlo ka aso da. Mniq ko hini bnbil bhniq ngahi, osa hnali way dyawi ko mangal ka ami.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Sani bnbil yaku hini ka qcurux. Dyaun misu bnbil.
Sani bnbil yako hini ka qcorox. Dyaon miso bnbil.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Taway bay knmalu wah! Kari bay nngalan saya, htngay kana ka lubuy qcurux da.
Taway bay knmalo wah! Kari bay nngalan saya, htngay kana ka loboy qcorox da.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Sanay ta musa nhari msupu psasu kana ta.
Sanay ta mosa nhari msopo psaso kana ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Ni ka mptusa da.
Ni ka mptosa da.
Iya ppulah da, Nhari tlung wakac.
Iya ppolah da, Nhari tlong wakac.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Ini balay klayi, scuqi ku da!
Ini balay klayi, scoqi ko da!
Nhari miyah truma.
Nhari miyah troma.
Tupiya diyax iyax sngayan ka saya?
Topiya diyax iyax sngayan ka saya?
Nan yobi ka saya?
Nan yobi ka saya?
Turima diyax iyax sngayan ka saya, msangay ka kusun, psupu ta musa ppulah pa!
Torima diyax iyax sngayan ka saya, msangay ka koson, psopo ta mosa ppolah pa!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: Kingyobi ka saya, msangay ka kusun, psupu ta musa ppulah pa!
Kingyobi ka saya, msangay ka koson, psopo ta mosa ppolah pa!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It's Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let's go out and play together!

S.FORM: Malu wah! Nta ssiyaw yayung.
Malo wah! Nta ssiyaw yayong.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let's go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Piya diyax iyax sngayan ka kusun?
Piya diyax iyax sngayan ka koson?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Nan yobi ka kusun?
Nan yobi ka koson?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Tuturu diyax iyax sngayan ka kusun, nta ppulah boru ka babaw cka hidaw kusun pa!
Totoro diyax iyax sngayan ka koson, nta ppolah boro ka babaw cka hidaw koson pa!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let's go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Mphuya su ka mrbu kusun?
Mphoya so ka mrbo koson?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Diyax sngayan ka kusun, tuhuy ku bubu mu musa pnrhulan.
Diyax sngayan ka koson, tohoy ko bobo mo mosa pnrholan.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Wa su hmuya da?
Wa so hmoya da?
Knpbrih ku, musa ku nganguc han.
Knpbrih ko, mosa ko ngangoc han.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Mtnuyung bay ka tunux mu.
Mtnoyong bay ka tonox mo.
Pquri truma ka dqras mi hiyi su msangay.
Pqori troma ka dqras mi hiyi so msangay.
Mptusa, mnarux nbuyas mu, musa ku san nganguc.
Mptosa, mnarox nboyas mo, mosa ko san ngangoc.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Iyaq, nhari musa.
Iyaq, nhari mosa.
Malu ku musa trima bawa hu?
Malo ko mosa trima bawa ho?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Uxay biyaw msangay snlhayan da, usa kiya hari da.
Uxay biyaw msangay snlhayan da, osa kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: It's almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Mptusa, mnarux bay ka tunux mu, mpsangay ku ka babaw cka hidaw han.
Mptosa, mnarox bay ka tonox mo, mpsangay ko ka babaw cka hidaw han.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
Teacher, I have a severe headache. I need to take a sick leave in the afternoon.

S.FORM: Iyaq, qlahang mmosa su sapah.
Iyaq, qlahang mmosa so sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Mptusa, mpsangay ku ka tukingal diyax iyax sngayan, mmosa ku pqita ising.
Mptosa, mpsangay ko ka tokingal diyax iyax sngayan, mmosa ko pqita ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Iyaq, ndwani qmlahang ka hiyi su.
Iyaq, ndwani qmlahang ka hiyi so.
Wa inu ka Ayuc?
Wa ino ka Ayoc?
Mnarux ka nbuyas na, wa mniq san nganguc ka hiya.
Mnarox ka nboyas na, wa mniq san ngangoc ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She's in the restroom.

S.FORM: Weynu ka Pawan?
Weyno ka Pawan?
Mptusa, mnarux welu na ka Pawan, msangay ka diyax saya.
Mptosa, mnarox welo na ka Pawan, msangay ka diyax saya.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Pawan has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Ma uka miyah ka Sawa saya?
Ma oka miyah ka Sawa saya?
Wisu neycu ka hiya da.
Wiso neyco ka hiya da.
Pkla yaku nanaq.
Pkla yako nanaq.
Watan Nukan ka hangan mu, maxal kngkawas mu ka kawas ni.
Watan Nokan ka hangan mo, maxal kngkawas mo ka kawas ni.
S.TRANSL: My name is Watan Nukan, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su?
Ima ka hangan so?
Temu Nawi ka hangan mu.
Temo Nawi ka hangan mo.
Laqi su minjoku ima ka isu?
Laqi so minjoko ima ka iso?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: Laqi ku Sediq minjoku ka yaku.
Laqi ko Sediq minjoko ka yako.
Sediq tnpusu kana ka tnsapah su hu?
Sediq tnposo kana ka tnsapah so ho?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Iyaq, Sediq blbalay kana ka tnsapah nami.
Iyaq, Sediq blbalay kana ka tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是賽德克族人。
Yes, my whole family is Sediq.

S.FORM: Sediq tnpusu kana ka tnsapah su hu?
Sediq tnposo kana ka tnsapah so ho?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Uxay, Sediq minjoku ka tama mu, sediq Holo ka bubu mu.
Uxay, Sediq minjoko ka tama mo, sediq Holo ka bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是賽德克族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Sediq, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Laqi su ima ka isu?
Laqi so ima ka iso?
Laqi ku Watan Nukan ka yaku.
Laqi ko Watan Nokan ka yako.
Way ka tama su hu? Khnu kngkawas na da?
Way ka tama so ho? Khno kngkawas na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Mturu kmxalan kngkawas na da.
Mtoro kmxalan kngkawas na da.
Way ka tama su hu? Khnu kngkawas na da?
Way ka tama so ho? Khno kngkawas na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Uxay, rudan tnualang nami ka hiya, mspac kmxalan kngkawas ka hiya da.
Uxay, rodan tnoalang nami ka hiya, mspac kmxalan kngkawas ka hiya da.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Piya kngkawas na ka qbsuran su snaw da?
Piya kngkawas na ka qbsoran so snaw da?
Maxal mspac kngkawas na ka qbsuran mu snaw da.
Maxal mspac kngkawas na ka qbsoran mo snaw da.
Mabang balay kngkawas su ka qbsuran su snaw hu?
Mabang balay kngkawas so ka qbsoran so snaw ho?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Mabang rima kngkawas mu ka hiya.
Mabang rima kngkawas mo ka hiya.
Khnu ka knreykun su?
Khno ka knreykon so?
Kbkuy spatul seyntmider ku ka yaku.
Kbkoy spatol seyntmider ko ka yako.
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada su mreykun da hay?
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada so mreykon da hay?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Kiya hmi, wada ku kbkuy mturul sentmider da.
Kiya hmi, wada ko kbkoy mtorol sentmider da.
Ya su wada qthur da?
Ya so wada qthor da?
Ini, wa su tuqu mita da.
Ini, wa so toqo mita da.
Wada su mliwang dhu?
Wada so mliwang dho?
Ini, wada ku qthur da.
Ini, wada ko qthor da.
Wada su qthur dhu?
Wada so qthor dho?
Iyaq, mturul kiro ku ka saya da.
Iyaq, mtorol kiro ko ka saya da.
Musa su inu?
Mosa so ino?
Musa ku nniqan qpahan mptusa ming mptusa.
Mosa ko nniqan qpahan mptosa ming mptosa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa ku ofis ming mptusa.
Mosa ko ofis ming mptosa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa inu ka Temu?
Mosa ino ka Temo?
Musa qmada sudu ka hiya.
Mosa qmada sodo ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Wa inu ka Ukan?
Wa ino ka Ukan?
Wa san tmapaq qsiya ka hiya, musa pnsung tmapaq qsiya ka hiya kiya hari da.
Wa san tmapaq qsiya ka hiya, mosa pnsong tmapaq qsiya ka hiya kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Wa inu ka Sawa? Muda pnsung tmalang ka hiya kiya hari.
Wa ino ka Sawa? Moda pnsong tmalang ka hiya kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: Sawa在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Sawa? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Wa mniq psliyanan ka hiya, sanun mu lmawa ka hiya.
Wa mniq psliyanan ka hiya, sanon mo lmawa ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: Psupu ta musa tlaman pa.
Psopo ta mosa tlaman pa.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Hayi ku mari uqun cka hidaw han, miyah ku ming isu kiya hari da.
Hayi ko mari oqon cka hidaw han, miyah ko ming iso kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Psupu ta musa kmudaw hndayu pa!
Psopo ta mosa kmodaw hndayo pa!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Usa ming sediq, musa ku ming mptusa.
Usa ming sediq, mosa ko ming mptosa.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa pnsung cnbu boru tuting ka Sudu saya hu?
Mosa pnsong cnbo boro toting ka Sodo saya ho?
S.TRANSL: Is Sudu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Uka, mmosa pnsung storing ka hiya.
Uka, mmosa pnsong storing ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Musa su pnsung ka undokay cida hu?
Mosa so pnsong ka ondokay cida ho?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Kiya hmi, musa ku pnsung tmalang.
Kiya hmi, mosa ko pnsong tmalang.
Musa su pnsung ka undokay cida hu?
Mosa so pnsong ka ondokay cida ho?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Musa ku pnsung boru tuting.
Mosa ko pnsong boro toting.
Manu ka owda ta undokay cida?
Mano ka owda ta ondokay cida?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Muda ta pnsung blbil wasil.
Moda ta pnsong blbil wasil.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Pbari ta uqun ka undokay hu?
Pbari ta oqon ka ondokay ho?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Uxay, pbari ta yupun.
Uxay, pbari ta yopon.
Wada su mangal ici bang ka isu hay, mbiyax su balay!
Wada so mangal ici bang ka iso hay, mbiyax so balay!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Mhoway so balay.
Wa sapah ka bubu rudan hu?
Wa sapah ka bobo rodan ho?
Wa sapah, wa mniq cka tqiyan mtaqi ka hiya.
Wa sapah, wa mniq cka tqiyan mtaqi ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Wa sapah ka bubu rudan hu?
Wa sapah ka bobo rodan ho?
Uka sapah, hana wada nganguc ka hiya, kasi ka kman da u kiya ka miyah sapah.
Uka sapah, hana wada ngangoc ka hiya, kasi ka kman da o kiya ka miyah sapah.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Wa mniq sapah ka tama ruda hu?
Wa mniq sapah ka tama roda ho?
Wa mniq tudha tkadan sapah ka hiya, usa baraw ming hiya pa.
Wa mniq todha tkadan sapah ka hiya, osa baraw ming hiya pa.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Niqan sediq ka sapah hu?
Niqan sediq ka sapah ho?
Ukan hay, bsiyaq su ini qtayi da, sndamac su balay, ya su malu hu?
Ukan hay, bsiyaq so ini qtayi da, sndamac so balay, ya so malo ho?
S.TRANSL: 是Ukan阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Ukan. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Malu ku balay wah! Miyah ku ming sunan pprngaw kari.
Malo ko balay wah! Miyah ko ming sonan pprngaw kari.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Weynu ka tama su?
Weyno ka tama so?
Wa mniq pchdanan pciyus sama ka hiya, haun mu lmawa ka hiya.
Wa mniq pchdanan pciyos sama ka hiya, haon mo lmawa ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Wada inu ka Lubi da?
Wada ino ka Lobi da?
Wada kadu rodux qmraq rodux ka hiya da.
Wada kado rodox qmraq rodox ka hiya da.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Tama rudan, mmeyyah nami da.
Tama rodan, mmeyyah nami da.
Uka sapah ka tama rudan namu, wa mniq qnpahan ka hiya, hay tmawa sapah ka hiya pa.
Uka sapah ka tama rodan namo, wa mniq qnpahan ka hiya, hay tmawa sapah ka hiya pa.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Swayi tama, ni su da hay!
Swayi tama, ni so da hay!
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada su mdakil da.
Bsiyaq ta ini tqita da, wada so mdakil da.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Mqaras ku balay qmita ku isu miyah tuhuy.
Mqaras ko balay qmita ko iso miyah tohoy.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Ni ka kalac sbuway munan, pniqi kcka kulu huda.
Ni ka kalac sboway monan, pniqi kcka kolo hoda.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su balay ini awah da, plwanun mu ka dhiya msupu ta mkan idaw kana.
Bsiyaq so balay ini awah da, plwanon mo ka dhiya msopo ta mkan idaw kana.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Iya psramal ana manu da, mimah ku ocya da malu da, mniq ta cka dxral sapah pprngaw kari.
Iya psramal ana mano da, mimah ko ocya da malo da, mniq ta cka dxral sapah pprngaw kari.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay snbliqan su, mmosa ku da.
Mhoway so balay snbliqan so, mmosa ko da.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Hana wada mhdu smipaq ka rodux ni, dsi isu thwani mkan.
Hana wada mhdo smipaq ka rodox ni, dsi iso thwani mkan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Prngaw ku sunan sturung ta babaw cka hidaw kasun dhaw?
Prngaw ko sonan storong ta babaw cka hidaw kason dhaw?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Malu, prngaw ta sturung inu?
Malo, prngaw ta storong ino?
Prngaw ta sturung sapah pyasan haw? Muda ta psueyga.
Prngaw ta storong sapah pyasan haw? Moda ta psoeyga.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Nta psliyanan alang dhnu, mplukus ku lukus ta Sediq.
Nta psliyanan alang dhno, mplokos ko lokos ta Sediq.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Malu balay qtan ka phpah snuwil alang nami. Mphpah cida daw awah ming knan pa!
Malo balay qtan ka phpah snowil alang nami. Mphpah cida daw awah ming knan pa!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Asi ka twaun dhuq srwasaw da, sqcuqi balay kiya da wah!
Asi ka twaon dhoq srwasaw da, sqcoqi balay kiya da wah!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Awah "Smratuc" cida ka isu dpa!
Awah "Smratoc" cida ka iso dpa!
Malu wah! pcmiyah ku balay!
Malo wah! pcmiyah ko balay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Ma su thdil musa mniq alang ka isu?
Ma so thdil mosa mniq alang ka iso?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Musa ku tmsa laqi muyas.
Mosa ko tmsa laqi moyas.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Hmuya su ini eniq alang mkbrnux tmsa laqi muyas?
Hmoya so ini eniq alang mkbrnox tmsa laqi moyas?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Alaw lnglungun mu balay ka alang mu, smatang ku cmiyuk unhuway alang uri.
Alaw lnglongon mo balay ka alang mo, smatang ko cmiyok onhoway alang ori.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Mkla su balay tminun, ima ka tmnesa sunan?
Mkla so balay tminon, ima ka tmnesa sonan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Bubu rudan mu ka tmnesa knan, hiya ka mkla balay tminun alang nami.
Bobo rodan mo ka tmnesa knan, hiya ka mkla balay tminon alang nami.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Ma su knsluhay tminun?
Ma so knslohay tminon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Wowaya nami ka tminun, yuxun mu pltudun dungan ka wowaya.
Wowaya nami ka tminon, yoxon mo pltodon dongan ka wowaya.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Malu balay mahan ka sinaw macu ni.
Malo balay mahan ka sinaw maco ni.
Qnepi mu nanaq wah!
Qnepi mo nanaq wah!
Mkla su balay ka isu, bsiyaq balay ka smmalu sinaw macu hu?
Mkla so balay ka iso, bsiyaq balay ka smmalo sinaw maco ho?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Ini qbsiyaq balay, ya bay dha iyax sngayan (nisyokang) da u malu da. Playun mhapuy ka dhquy mi macu, malun tamul prmaxun dungal, kiya ka malu psaun liwas da.
Ini qbsiyaq balay, ya bay dha iyax sngayan (nisyokang) da o malo da. Playon mhapoy ka dhqoy mi maco, malon tamol prmaxon dongal, kiya ka malo psaon liwas da.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約兩個禮拜就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about two weeks. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: Niqan manu ka sbari su?
Niqan mano ka sbari so?
Niqan ucik mi qucun ka yaku hini, pnhuma mu nanaq kana wah!
Niqan ocik mi qocon ka yako hini, pnhoma mo nanaq kana wah!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Briyun kana ka dha u khnu pila?
Briyon kana ka dha o khno pila?
Kana balay pa dha kbkuy mrimal pila.
Kana balay pa dha kbkoy mrimal pila.
Smkuxul ku lukus ni, piya pila?
Smkoxol ko lokos ni, piya pila?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Rima kbkuy pila ka lukus ni.
Rima kbkoy pila ka lokos ni.
Mkray balay da, malu mhnuk hari hu?
Mkray balay da, malo mhnok hari ho?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Naqah, mhnuk balay daw ini tuku ka sntkuwan mu da.
Naqah, mhnok balay daw ini toko ka sntkowan mo da.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Iyaq wa! So kiya daw mari ku lukus mqalux way.
Iyaq wa! So kiya daw mari ko lokos mqalox way.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Mari ku yayu ni mi cbracan ni.
Mari ko yayo ni mi cbracan ni.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Kana balay u mpusal kbkuy klabuy, smnalu mu bawa nanaq ka ni, qulung musa malu bsiyaq ddiyun.
Kana balay o mposal kbkoy klaboy, smnalo mo bawa nanaq ka ni, qolong mosa malo bsiyaq ddiyon.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Pkla ku dangi mu miyah mari, ya malu mhnuk hari dungan hu?
Pkla ko dangi mo miyah mari, ya malo mhnok hari dongan ho?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Iyaq wa! Dyaun misu skhnuk mspac kmxalan paseynto.
Iyaq wa! Dyaon miso skhnok mspac kmxalan paseynto.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Awah qmita wah! Niqan briyan kana ka lukus mi bunuh.
Awah qmita wah! Niqan briyan kana ka lokos mi bonoh.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Khnu pila ka lukus?
Khno pila ka lokos?
Kingal ka lukus pa turu kbkuy mrimal pila, turu lukus da u maxal kbkuy pila.
Kingal ka lokos pa toro kbkoy mrimal pila, toro lokos da o maxal kbkoy pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Mari ku kingal daw kiya da, brahaw su balay bqani ku burah.
Mari ko kingal daw kiya da, brahaw so balay bqani ko borah.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Sndamac su balay, iyux ku mari hlama sukay mi siyang mqri.
Sndamac so balay, iyox ko mari hlama sokay mi siyang mqri.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買紅豆糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy red bean sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Wada qduwan mari da. Niqan ku emu sangas nina, mbari su hu?
Wada qdowan mari da. Niqan ko emo sangas nina, mbari so ho?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Iyaq wah! Brahaw su balay, biqi ku kingal, miyah ku mari hlama sukay ka nduray dungan.
Iyaq wah! Brahaw so balay, biqi ko kingal, miyah ko mari hlama sokay ka ndoray dongan.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買紅豆糯米飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Iyaq, dyaun misu lmabu lubuy kapa, so ni u mrimal krtan pila.
Iyaq, dyaon miso lmabo loboy kapa, so ni o mrimal krtan pila.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
